author: Metamask
title: Metamask
shortDescription: A crypto wallet & gateway to blockchain apps
description: MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. You are always in control when interacting on the new decentralized web.

author: Dfinn Wallet
title: Dfinn Wallet
shortDescription: Non-custodial wallet solution for the Substrate and EVM
description: DFINN Wallet emerges as the all-encompassing non-custodial wallet solution catering to Substrate and EVM Blockchains.Riding on the capabilities of Polkadot.js, Dfinn Wallet places a strong emphasis on enriching the user experience and refining the user interface.

author: Mainnet Exchange
title: Mainnet Exchange
description: Trade with confidence, harness the power of the Ethereum Virtual Machine, and dive into a world of borderless possibilities. Join the evolution of decentralized trading.

author: Mainnet Bridge
title: Mainnet Bridge
description: Seamlessly Bridge and Expand Possibilities with Our EVM Bridge.Embrace cross-chain functionality, unlock new horizons, and amplify the potential of decentralized ecosystems.

author: MePAD
title: MePAD
description: Get ready to participate in the future of blockchain innovation and secure your place in the forefront of crypto evolution.

author: Multisender
title: Multisender
description: Token Multisender Dapp smart contract. Airdrop tokens. Batch sending ERC20, ETH, Ethereum tokens. Send thousands of transfers in a few transactions. It can help user to save more tx fee and time than sending one by one

author: Edgverse Exchange
title: Edgeverse Exchange
description: Edgeverse Exchange aggregator, is a powerful tool in the world of decentralized finance (DeFi) that simplifies and enhances the process of trading cryptocurrencies on various decentralized exchanges.
